message:
heartily wished to cast my vote for right candidate who will be able to make our dream truth. Sorrowful that would not be possible in 10th National Election, held on 5 January'2013. It may the first time in #Bangladesh, a autocratic election is going to take place where majority voters will not even have a chance to cast there vote. This is the worst mockery on the sake of democracy, constitution.
 Therefore I stand with the citizens of Bangladesh who need the answer....
#WhereIsMyVote? #AmarVoteKoi?
 We want #Democracy and we are #AntiAutocracy
 So we are going to #BoycottElection that will held 
 on 5th January to #SaveBangladesh.

Abdullah Al Asem
